Text:
You should encode it with latest x264 in mencoder @ full res, then put it in a PMP file then it can be played on the PSP with the player PMP Player or whatever it's called.

Only works on 1.50 though.
will the pmp player run on firmware 2.71 se-c ?
i take it u mean full res of the PSP 480*272 not the media its actually from. looks like a good idea, ill give some a go !
